items.sentence: Tom said he didn\'t know that Mary couldn\'t speak French very well.
Tom knew that Mary thought John and Alice were going to get married.
As soon as Tom walked into the room, everyone started to look happy.
Tom asked Mary how much she\'d paid for the sofa in her living room.
I\'m going over to Tom\'s house now to tell him about what happened.
Tom\'s parents have decided to punish Tom for staying out all night.
We won\'t have another chance to do that anytime in the near future.
Tom explained everything to Mary, but I don\'t think she understood.
Mary was dressed all in white, except for a pink ribbon in her hair.
Tom wanted to drive, but since he was drunk, Mary wouldn\'t let him.
